name: Popmoji
description:
🤩 In Popmoji you combine two of the same emojis to create bigger emojis until the cycle is finished. But the bigger they get...the less space you'll have to place them!

😲 Strategically drop emojis in the box to match and create bigger ones!

🥶 Use abilities to create crazier scenarios, and increase your chances of survival!

🏆 Fight for the best spot on the leaderboard!

Includes 11 different emojis in the cycle and 15 different abilities!

Inspired by the viral Suika Game; now with a new coat of paint, and abilities to make it feel like the next weird mixed-genre Vampire Survivors!
